physical_properties.material: Shapeshifting metal with chaos crystal core

gear_slot.notes: Can be worn on either left or right ring slot

effects.name: Metamorphic Mastery
effects.description: Adaptability attribute effectiveness increased by 20-35% (scales with level)

effects.name: Situational Flexibility
effects.description: Once per combat, may change one active ability to a different one from the same school

effects.name: Chaos Harmony
effects.description: Chaos damage spells have 15% chance to trigger beneficial random effects

acquisition.rarity_notes: Only manifests for those who have truly mastered the art of adaptation

lore.description: This ring shifts its appearance constantly, reflecting the wearer's current needs and the chaotic beauty of endless possibility.
lore.history: Created by a legendary Succubus who sought to capture the essence of perfect adaptation in physical form.
lore.creator: Archshaper Metamorphia the Eternal
lore.significance: Represents the philosophy that true power comes from the ability to change with circumstances
